name: modern-voting-system
description: Modern Online Voting System with React Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.build:prod: cd client && npm run build && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: cp -r client/build/* public/ 2>/dev/null || xcopy client\build public\ /E /Y 2>nul || echo 'Static files ready'
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-deps && echo Setup complete! Run 'npm run dev' to start both frontend and backend
scripts.prepare-deploy: npm run install-deps && npm run build && echo Deployment files ready!

author: Modern Voting System
